home.hero_title: Building Smarter Solutions with Rust, AI, and APIs
home.hero_subtitle: Specialized in Rust training, LLM integration, and AI agent development for businesses across Switzerland and beyond.
home.services_subtitle: Specialized services that help businesses innovate and transform through modern technology solutions.
home.insights_subtitle: Thoughts and tutorials on Rust, LLM integration, and AI agent development.
home.api0_description: api0.ai is my flagship solution for enterprises looking to streamline API integrations. Using advanced NLP, it intelligently matches user sentences to the right API endpoints, reducing development time and complexity.
home.work_subtitle: Showcasing successful projects and collaborations across Switzerland and beyond.
home.testimonials_subtitle: The experiences of those who have benefited from my services.
home.ready_elevate: Ready to Elevate Your Tech Stack?
home.cta_description: Contact me for Rust training, LLM integration, or custom solutions that drive innovation and efficiency.

rust_training.title: Rust Training
rust_training.description: Expert-led Rust training for professionals and teams, covering memory safety, concurrency, and performance optimization. Tailored courses for beginners to advanced developers, with real-world applications in fintech, systems programming, and more.
rust_training.benefit1: Master Rust's ownership system and memory safety features
rust_training.benefit2: Learn concurrent programming patterns with Rust's guarantees
rust_training.benefit4: Apply Rust to real-world problems in your domain

llm_integration.title: LLM Integration
llm_integration.description: Seamlessly connect large language models (LLMs) to your applications for enhanced automation, chatbots, and data processing. Custom solutions designed to integrate with your existing systems, ensuring scalability and performance.
llm_integration.benefit1: Integrate leading LLMs into your existing products
llm_integration.benefit2: Build custom knowledge bases for domain-specific applications
llm_integration.benefit4: Create robust evaluation systems for LLM outputs

ai_agent.title: AI Agent Development
ai_agent.description: Build intelligent AI agents for automation, decision-making, and process optimization. From concept to deployment, I create agents that leverage NLP and gRPC for enterprise-grade performance.
ai_agent.benefit1: Automate complex workflows with intelligent agents
ai_agent.benefit2: Create agents that can reason about your domain
ai_agent.benefit3: Connect to multiple data sources and APIs
ai_agent.benefit4: Build self-improving systems with feedback loops

api0.title: api0.ai Solutions
api0.description: Promote api0.ai, my cutting-edge platform that uses advanced NLP to match user inputs to API endpoints, simplifying integrations for enterprises. Easy-to-use, secure, and designed for minimal setup.
api0.benefit1: Match natural language inputs to the right API endpoints
api0.benefit3: Secure API key management with domain restrictions

services.contact_description: Contact me to discuss your specific needs and how my services can help your business innovate and grow.

about.hero_subtitle: Bringing expertise in Rust, AI agents, and API solutions to clients worldwide
about.description1: As a solopreneur based in Switzerland, I specialize in delivering cutting-edge solutions in Rust programming, AI agent development, and seamless LLM integrations.
about.description2: With a passion for simplifying complex systems, I empower businesses through tailored Rust training and innovative tools like api0.ai, my NLP-driven API-matching solution.
about.description3: My work blends technical expertise with a commitment to driving efficiency and innovation for enterprises worldwide.
about.description4: Proudly operating from the heart of Switzerland, I bring precision and reliability to every project.

client_success.title: Client Success
client_success.description: Focusing on outcomes that drive real business value and innovation.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: Creating elegant solutions that reduce complexity and are easy to understand.

about.project_subtitle: My flagship innovation, streamlining API integrations through advanced NLP
about.project_description1: api0.ai represents the culmination of my work in AI and API integration, providing a solution that intelligently matches natural language inputs to the right API endpoints.
about.project_description2: Using advanced natural language processing, api0.ai simplifies the integration process for businesses, reducing development time and complexity while providing robust security features.
about.cta_description: Let's discuss how my expertise can help your business achieve its goals with innovative technology solutions.
